page.title: 13A SHORT STAY IN WYTHALL
page.content: Bournville Village Trust own Windmill House and it is leased to Birmingham Youth Club Association. Maintenance of buildings and furniture is one of their biggest problems. Most of the Youths are under 19 years and come from the city centre ,few are foreign. Various courses, sports, horse riding. Canoeing is run at Earlswood and at Arrow Valley.Courses on leadership in games, refereeing and training for young managers in various industries take place.The house has 48 main rooms which can accommodate 70 people at a time.Future plans intend to widen the age range to include holidays for senior citizens from Birmingham. {Wythall Caravan Club.}Many people know and use this site.Some stop overnight. Others go to places of interest in the Midlands.112 caravans are on the site. {SILVERMEAD.}
